originalText.text: Dr. Allen was recommended to me by an agent for professional athletes. He replaced my ACL in 2012, and all theses years later I'm still skiing, running, deadlifting and kicking.

text.text: Dr. Allen was recommended to me by an agent for professional athletes. He replaced my ACL in 2012, and all theses years later I'm still skiing, running, deadlifting and kicking.

originalText.text: You cannot get any better than Dr. Allen. Dr. Allen has reconstructed both my right and left ACL. Prior to using Dr. Allen I used a different surgeon that was local for my ACL tear. I retore that same ACL and knee was completely screwed up. Dr. Allen not only repaired my knee (ACL revision), but I truly felt my knee was bionic and indestructible. When I began my freshman year in college and told the athletic trainers and team doctor that Dr. Allen had done my knee they had no fear and continuously told me I was in the best hands. Unfortunately I ended up tearing my other ACL this year, but it was a no brainer to use Dr. Allen. Dr. Allen’s staff is incredible too. Kudos to Steven James for always being so personable on the phone, Jason DAmelio ATC for always keeping up with the stages of my recovery, and Rebecca Johnson PA for always answering any questions I had regarding my recovery!

originalText.text: Doctor Answorth Allen is amazing. Met with a few doctors prior to decision. His staff is beyond polite & extremely professional. 3 weeks post ACL knee reconstruction & I am walking without brace, pushing hard @ PT & feel amazing. He explained everything prior/post surgery. Cant recommend him enough.

originalText.text: Dr Allen is an amazingly compassionate and talented surgeon. I listened to the things he told me to do and the pain was minimal. My shoulder is perfect. The team at HSS is great too.

text.text: Dr Allen is an amazingly compassionate and talented surgeon. I listened to the things he told me to do and the pain was minimal. My shoulder is perfect. The team at HSS is great too.

originalText.text: Dr. Allen was amazing! He really takes his time with you. He understood my issues and made me feel like my health was the main priority. He gave me great advice as well. He took his time to recommend different options before surgery. I would highly recommend. I was seeing multiple people before deciding to commit to Dr. Allen. But he’s #1!!
